content.detailedDescription: As a college professor for 29 years i testify that what i say is true. in 1994 i saw 3 gigantic triangular shaped ufo's,each the size of a football field at the meadowlands racetrack new jersey. it was the middle of the afternoon. my husband a doctor was in the barn with his horses. he was showing a former student who had kept in touch with me the horses. i was outside rollerblading. it was aclear blue sky,not a cloud in it, when suddenly i looked up to sae a small triangle slowly emerge as if coming through a screen which was the sky.I thought maybe it was some sort of stange new plane,but it was gigantic.Then another wing appeared,thenstill another wing was evident untill there finally appeared three giant fully formed triangular shaped ufo's in formation.Once they were completely apparent& motionless,hovering above me for about 1-2minutes from about over twice as high as the empire state building, they all turned as if in formation untill they were only pencil thin,then right in front of me they dissappeared.I was shaking in my rollerblades. i couldn't believe what i just saw.It has been 15 years & it is as fresh in my mind as when i had first seen it & has haunted me since. i've seen the bottom of many planes but nothing comes close to one speck of the size of one of these crafts.There was not a sound in the sky.They had a light at each of the corners of the crafts.I don't know why i did not realize i could report this to someone.I guess i was busy & a little scared.In 1996 i saw an episode on "sightings" tv show where a 5 year old boy had drawn these triangular shaped ufo's sighted in belgium where they had a cluster of them seen by many people.I always thought ufo's were round & had never heard of a triangular ufo untill this program. i knew i wasn't alone. the other strange thing i only heard a few years ago;i caught the tail end of a comedians act on tv.The last thing he said was;"like the ufo's at the meadowlands!"then i knew others had to have seen it, although i didn't see anyone close by me.I would be glad to draw exactly what i saw for you if you are interested as i teach art.I don't know how to send w/email.I know it was a long time ago,but i feel that something will happen in2012,which is so close suddenly.There is so little time left.People haveto be told.I've told many of my students of course they think i'm crazy. i don't drink or do drugs. i've also became an ordained minister 3 years ago,& will swear on a stack of bibles that this testimony is god's honest truth! i hope you will contact me, if it's at all helpfull.
content.summary: Saw 3 gigantic triangular shape ufos, slate grey/light at each corner. each size of footballfield. they appeared out of  blue cloudless sky -then dissappeared.

content.detailedDescription: Standing out in back yard at around 10 pm .  i am living in sicily near a town named acireale.  looking up in a ne direction, it looked like a star was acting strange.  i saw two small discs appear and move down to about 1km in a sweeping arc and accelerate towards the sw.  in about a minute, a single disc appeared from the original star position and follow the same path as the first two.  about 15 sec. two more appeared but moved directly south.  last two discs appeared and followed the south path.  speed was extreame, discs moved from star position to south, sw in less than three seconds.
content.summary: Several discs deploying from east of mt. etna, sicily, moving in pairs towards sw.

content.detailedDescription: I was taking a sequence of pictures of the lunar eclipse on february 20th, 2008. when i reviewed the pictures i found in some of the pictures diamond shaped bright objects flying over the surface of the darken moon. i have pictures available on my blog page: http://www.Neoselvazoologicalconservancy.Com/2008/02/greetings-to-moon-from-my-garden.Html
content.summary: Diamond shape bright objects over moon during eclipse (pictures)

content.detailedDescription:
I'm a work doing my normal stuff had to take out the trash that was next. 
well i just to look up at the stars because i looking at them, anyway i see waht look like a star slowly going across the sky. i know waht a airplane looked like at night and this was not it.. so im watchin this thing and i see a second one behind it... i keep watch it. it turns quickly it make like a s shape and the second on followed right behind it.
i was kind of freked out i dont won't if i thought i was see in things or what. because i watch ufo hunters and to see one for myself i'm shocked to tell u the truth. after it did its s shape there was a hotel behind us and i lose sight of it. i'm not making this up. please belive me.
content.summary: Like 2 stars following each other

content.detailedDescription: While visiting georgia (not u.S. but easter europe or caucasus as you wish)for business on november the 7th 2009 me and my locas friend went to tbilisi suburbs for sighteeing (place called ckneti i guess) and on our way back to the capital, it was already dark, we saw a big glowing object jumpping east-west and viceversa with a tremendous speed... glowing and flashing very rarely though... we saw it for a minute or so, then after a corckscrew corner on our way we lost it behind a mountain. there were two cars stopped on the edge of the street with the drivers watching the object as well. in my opinion the subject was only 300 or 400 meters in the sky maybe 20 meters of diameter. object was as big as a full moon and moving almost like a nonsolid object. we did not hear a sound even though we passed very slowly and i opened the front window. i saw a lot of things in the sky but this one was something special almost like giving you an awareness thet it was not a plane or something else. difficult to explain... can only feel it. once got back to italy i documented myself finding your site. so, wanted to share.
content.summary: Glowing object jumping in the sky seen near tbilisi, georgia

content.detailedDescription: I was getting home from having coffee with some relatives. i live in compton california, it was around 2:00 am,, i stepped out of their car and looked at the sky as is was a very clear tonight and i want to take a look at the stars,, i then looked to my right which is west, and i saw 3 dim orange lights flying in triangle formation flying west to east in a straight direction. i thought it was a plane initially but i looked for flashing lights and didn't see anything,,, it was moving pretty fast so then i thought it could be a military plane,, but when it flew directly over me i couldn't see anything but the 3 dim orange lights,, i yelled at my cousin to take a look at it as well and he was equally surprised at what we were seeing,,, then as it flew east i saw the light on the left of the triangle pull forward and the light that was initially in front pull behind it, then the light on right looked like it merged with the trailing light,, at that point the just disappeared into the sky. i don't know what that was i am hoping someone can tell me it was a military plane,, i don't believe in aliens,, i've tried blogging at news sites,, i just want to know if someone other than my cousin and i saw anything tonight,, it is by far the wildest thing i have ever seen,, i'm actually a bit scared,, and don't know who to talk to about it,,,  unfortunately we have no pictures or video,, the whole thing lasted about 15 seconds and i didn't even think about taking my iphone out,, i don't think it would have worked anyway as the lights were dimmer that the stars.
content.summary: 3 orange lights flying in triangle formation

content.detailedDescription:
...I was smoking a cigarette on my terasse, watching the sky, as i suddenly could not trust my eyes seeing a squadron of ufo's scout ships flying directly towards my house.

squadron of about 6-7 orange ufo's, close to each other, flying by with a speed of about 300 km/h at an altitiude of about 1-2 km. the altitude is difficult to define, because it was a little cloudy and it was night. i don't know how hight these kind of clouds are, but the ships must have been below.
they were flying over elgg in direction of winterthur.
there was no noise, the ships were close to each other and they were glowing orange (..Not blinking - there is also a lot of human air trafic in this region). the last was a little bigger and also glowing brighter than the others. at a distance of about 5km they suddenly disapeared all at once.
content.summary: Squadron of about 6-7 orange glowing ufo's, close to each other, flying by with a speed of about 300 km/h at an altitiude of about 1-2 km

content.detailedDescription: I was simply taking pictures of the mountain range from my back deck in denver, colorado.  i see some odd shapes in the sky so i get my digital camera. not sure what is seen in my camera pictures so i am sending to you all. i have 8 pictures total...What are they?  the odd thing is in the first pic 1727 there is small light (actually a couple small lights) to the left of the main light object, then in the 1730 picture the streaking light is aimed right at the main light. then in the final 1734 picture the small light that was once at left of main light is all of a sudden at the right of the main light, and the streaking light is seen smaller right below the main object. is this anything?
content.summary: Ball of light, see pics...

content.detailedDescription: I alone was standing outside on an oil production platform approx 7 miles off the coast of venice, la. i noticed the object by chance due to the fact that it was not flying at an altitude taken by approaching or departing helicopers, airplanes,though infrequent,flew much higher. the object was approx 1 mile off the water, i was facing land. the object appeared to be approx 2 miles away from me,it was close enough to see that it appeared to be a "classic" flying saucer, disc shaped with a round dome on top. the sides of the dome were straight coming off the disk a little bit, then rounded out into the dome. the object was shiny silver metallic. it flew straight with no attitude adjustments at about 10 mph. i watched it for about 3 minutes before it dissapeared into a cloud. it was a sunny day, visibility was unlimited.
content.summary: Disc shaped object with round dome on top

content.detailedDescription: i read the sightings on this website daily and now have one of my own to post. because i was curious to see if anyone else would post a similar sighting, i waited until now to post mine. well, someone from texas did post a sighting that matches mine exactly, other than the date and time of day are different. my sighting is identical to the one observed november 12 in texas. mine, however, occurred on november 25 between 1:50 pm and 2:00 pm on the northwest side of san antonio. i was out on my apartment patio and just happened to look up into the clear blue sky. i soon saw an object that i first thought was an aircraft of some kind. since we have two air force bases and one army base, plus civilian airports, seeing something in the sky is a common occurrence. immediately, though, i knew there was something different about this object. as i stared at it, i could tell that it was white and rectangular, with no wings. there was also no contrail behind this "craft", and it was heading from a northwest to a southeast direction seamlessly. in other words, it was travelling smoothly through the air. at a couple of points during its journey that i saw, it appeared to be reflecting light off of it, or perhaps it was emitting something that gave that appearance. there also appeared to be some device attached to its top that resembled a radar dish. it also seemed to disappear, then reappear while i was watching it. finally, as i was trying to retrieve my binoculars, it completely disappeared past some buildings and trees. i knew i had seen something i could not explain, and it was very exciting.
content.summary: White, rectangular object, no contrail and no sound

content.detailedDescription:
Omg...

the triangle just passed over belmont, north carolina at around 9:00pm on this the 28th day of november 2009.  i was out walking the dog when i looked up and saw white lights in the form of a v coming my way and pass overhead at an alarming increase of speed from north to south.  only four white lights were visible three uniform and one extra between the front and starboard ���wing��� side, it was amazing to see.  it went over so fast i didn���t even have time to say to myself, ���i wish i had my camcorder��� before it zipped out of sight over my head and before i could swing my body around to match the direction of my eyes, and there was no noise coming from it.  it was truly a fascinating watch.  

charlotte douglas airport is in charlotte to the east of me about ten miles and this is a frequent flyover point for many incoming and outgoing flights but this was no airplane.  i know it was not a flight due to it was the only one to go over head and flights take off and land in waves and not from that direction.  i watch them alot.

it's exact size and altitude i do not know but if i'd had time to size it, it would have been the size of my thumb and still slightly visible, maybe half the size of my palm.

and now i���m more certain it isn���t the aurora project��� wrong direction of travel...
content.summary: 4 triangle lights, 3 uniform plus 1 on starboard side

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i saw something very different in the sky on thanksgiving night about 6pm in destin florida while watching tv and surfing the net. a bright light that looked more like fire than a light, moving west to east slowly along the gulf coast. it was less than a 1/4 mile away, only about 250 to 300 feet high, and made no noise. we watched from our southwest facing balcony on the gulf of mexico until it moved slowly behind some buildings and then up into the sky as if it were burning out.
 
we were surprised when a second one came about 20 minutes later following the same path except when it began to move up it broke apart. the bottom half of the fire moved down to the gulf with some fire dripping from it and the top half rose up disappearing into the night sky as if it were burning out. we could not determine any noticeable shape or outline because it was dark. 
 
i did not have time to get my binoculars or video camera because i did not want to miss the brief event. but i did have both ready after the second sighting but no more were sighted the rest of the night. someone was shooting fireworks on the beach approximately one or two minutes after the second object which may have had something to do with our sighting.
 
i believe in god. i also believe there may be other intelligence in the universe, but i am waiting for indisputable truth and proof. seeing is not believing. i don't believe shaky unfocused video, shadows in the night, or crop circles. come on now, this is a 2009 intelligent high tech society we live in with multitasking cell phones, digital cameras, high power telescopes, and listening devices that can hear an ant pissing on cotton. do you have some scientific, physical evidence, that i can feel, see, hear, touch, smell, and speak to? show me.
content.summary: 2 bright objects approximately 20 minutes apart slowly moving west to east and then upwards

content.detailedDescription:
Here is something that i had hoped that i would never see ever again. on august 21, 2004 my fmaily and i saw these lights over the sky, and we did not get footage. we did report this when we saw it last time. last year the history channel did a special on tinley and these lights called ufo hunters, tinley park, il.

well the same thing happened again tonight. my parents were in matteson, il and they called me to tell me that the lights were back.
i looked outside southeast towards downtown tinley park, and they were back. they were in a line again like last time, however this time they were a lot more bright! this time they were giant and whitish goldish in color. they were at least ten times the size that they were last time we saw them. 

they did the same thing as last time. they changed shapes and formations from a line, to a triangle, then spread out and dissapeared. one came back by itself like last time, and then faded out. 

this is exactly what i saw 5 years ago! i am so amazed, and freaked out. 

what are these lights!!!!!!!!!!!!!????!?!?!?!???
content.summary: Very bright lights changing formation over tinley park

content.detailedDescription:
Well,

because i am writing a book on ufo photography, and i am almost finished the book, i decided to add a section of the book on submission of ufo pictures taken to various organizations. 

this picture was taken on october 29, 2009. so i am going through your photo and video submission process to capture how you folks want these things submitted.  however, i have removed my personal information from the exif file part of the picture - making copies of the originals in the process - information on these two pictures, so the pictures will read that they were taken tonight.
content.summary: Ufo - alien in window of craft

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking my dog at approx. 2:45p.M. looking up in the sky saw a white, rectangular object moving north to south. it was clearly visible against a clear blue sky moving about 150 m.P.H. no observable propulsion system, no cockpit, no vapor trail, no sound, moving steadily. at the end of the event the center of the object started to disappear and blend with the blue sky. the edges turned a medium gray color and slowly they too faded away and the object completely disappeared. i looked for a good 25 or 30 seconds for any sign but the object was completely gone. it was the most amazing thing i have seen in my whole life. 

call me if you have any questions, any day around noon or if im not there leave a message on my message machine.
content.summary: Walking my dog looking up in the sky saw a white, rectangular object moving north to south

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking my dog at approx. 2:45p.M. looking up in the sky saw a white, rectangular object moving north to south. it was clearly visible against a clear blue sky moving about 150 m.P.H. no observable propulsion system, no cockpit, no vapor trail, no sound, moving steadily. at the end of the event the center of the object started to disappear and blend with the blue sky. the edges turned a medium gray color and slowly they too faded away and the object completely disappeared. i looked for a good 25 or 30 seconds for any sign but the object was completely gone. it was the most amazing thing i have seen in my whole life. 

call me if you have any questions, any day around noon or if im not there leave a message on my message machine.
content.summary: Walking my dog looking up in the sky saw a white, rectangular object moving north to south

content.detailedDescription:
I saw a ufo on 24th nov, 2009 in peoria, il. so i was looking at sky hoping to see one more ufo. i was in the car, back seat on a highway. 
when i looked at the sky, i saw a white line, as if someone drew it with a ruler. i thought a bit weird.
few minutes later when i was heading south, i looked up again and found that line closer, with no shape of plane in front of that line. and the line was moving forward!
i felt so weird and i took a photo, it was very hard to take one because the car was moving so fast on the highway.
anyway when i looked the photo i took, i found that it is a sphere!
i saw few more flying objects behind the sphere and in front of the sphere which seemed like chasing the sphere from back and front.
when i took those photos, they came out just like jets. but the sphere was sphere in my photo again and again.
it was a very shiny sphere, moving fast like the speed of a jet, but the difference was that it didn't make engine smoke.
the jets were making engine smokes, which spreads to air after some time, but the sphere made a line, which caused by friction of the air because it was flying so fast.
that's why the line seemed so weird, like pen drawn line and made me look at it.

suddenly the sphere disappeared and after few minutes, and the two jets one chasing from behind and one coming from front, crossed each other, quite close each other.
then, the metal sphere appeared on the sky near where it was disappeared, little bigger size, maybe closer to me. it looked very clearly like a shiny metal sphere with no legs, wings, windows nothing.
it stood there for 2 or 3 seconds, not moving at all and then slowly disappeared its shape, as if it melted in to the air.

first photo is a close view of the flying sphere.
second photo is a photo of jet which was coming towards the sphere, you can see the difference of shape and the line they are making.
third photo is taken while the sphere was disappearing.
fourth is another photo of sphere flying,
last one is same as third one.

it was very hard to take a photo, camera could not focus the small thing in the sky.
content.summary: Metal sphere flying through the air, making a line, chased by 3-4 jets, stood on the air, disappeared through the air

content.detailedDescription: Around 5:45p on friday nov 6th, my husband & i were leaving work to head home. as we were about to get into our vehicle, i had had the notion to quadruple-check the back doors (my husband & i have ocd when it comes to locking doors, which is a good habit!).  while my husband was loading himself & our dog into our vehicle, i jogged to the back of the building.  after everything checked out ok, i jogged back to the front side of the building & stopped dead in my tracks when i noticed 3 red lights.  at first i thought, "what a weird plane", but as my brain slowly processed what i was seeing, i noticed this was no plane at all. this object did not make the slightest sound. as i looked at the 3 red lights, i noticed the shape of an equilateral triangle. the bottom 2 lights would stobe together & the top light would stobe at the same rate but at a slightly different time. the lights would always be on but flash at different times, almost as if they were dimming lights?  as i was fixated on this object, i noticed the top light was moving down & to the left while the 2 bottom lights stayed at the same fixed distance. finally my brain kicked into motion & i ran as fast as i could to get my husband. he then ran to the back with me and was astounded by what we saw. there were no lights other than the 3 red lights. whatever unseen hard object that was bordered by the lights seemed to be rotating slowly, as if the "foward" point were moving counterclockise from west to north. after it completed this 90 degree rotation, it began to slowly and silently move to the north horizon. it was hard to gauge the overall size of the object.  we would guess that it was approx 300 ft wide. the size was very hard to guage especially because of the unknown altitude and lack of comparable structures..  if it was as low as we thought, it should have made some kind of sound.  if was a "plane" at such a high altitutde that it wouldn't make any sound then the craft would have to be thousands of feet wide. we watched the triangle for no more than a minute and proceeded to get in the car and attempt to follow it as it headed north.  thanks to our towns pointless infrastructure, we we stopped at a red light for way too long and by the time we were able to follow the direction of what we saw, we had lost sight of the craft.   we live & work in the flight paths of a regional airport & we are surrounded by miltary bases in almost every cardinal direction. we are extremely familiar with civilian, commercial, and military planes, and are certain this did not belong to any above categories. if this was a secret aircraft, it flew very conspicuously over a high-density population area, with 3 attention getting wierd red strobes. we had even considered if it was 3 separate aircraft, but the precision and uniformity of distance, movement, and complete silence eliminated that as a possibility. we were very excited and somewhat nervous seeing this so close up, but were ultimately disappointed in missing closer details, like what the stucture looked like or where it was going.
content.summary: Three red lights in a triangular formation, passing almost overhead

content.detailedDescription:
While on a short flight over the city of anderson and the surronding area, we inadvertantly captured "something" on video. no one in the plane saw it at the time. here is what happened. first of all, i am not a pilot, but i was at the controls at the time( front right seat). the pilot was to my left letting me do the flying, reason being i told him that i was thinking of getting my license, so he let me see what it was like. my oldest brother(now deceased) was sitting behind the pilot, and my son was sitting behind me. my brother was using my camera, not really looking thru the lens, but just kind of pointing it. after the flight, i went home and  veiwed the tape with my wife and kids. in the tape, we were south of anderson around interstate 69, when my brother pointed the camera out his window, and it happened kind of fast, but what you can see is a silver ball shaped object come up toward the plane from behind, then it would fall back out of frame. then a few seconds later it came back in the shot for a few more seconds then it did what looked like a barrel roll down and to the left. i don't know what it was, but i would like for someone with a little more knowlegde to take a look at it. if anyone at mufon is interested in taking a look, you can contact me at the email address above. i do ask that i remain anonymous please.

                         thank you.
content.summary: Video footage taken while in a single engine airplane.

content.detailedDescription:
Mid-august, 2009. live oak, fl

i was at home watching tv around 10pm when i went outside for a smoke. it was a very clear night and i was looking up at the stars towards the north west. i noticed an object moving in a roughly south east direction in a straight line. it looked very similar to a dimly lit star. there were no noticeable lights (steady or flashing), what little light coming from it appeared to be reflected light. at first i thought i was watching the iss going overhead. i have seen the iss before and this object looked very much like it. i figured i was either watching the iss or a satellite passing by, cool.

i watched it for maybe half a minute when it suddenly made a sharp, right angle turn towards the south west (almost directly away from me). i thought to myself "what the ???". it continued in a straight line towards the south west for about a half a minute. then it made another right angle turn back towards the south east. 

the object continued this pattern making several right angle turns every 30 seconds or so, back and fourth, zig zagging like a staircase across the sky.

eventually it moved beyond the tree line to my south east. the object probably took less than few minutes to cross the sky (my field of view). i remember thinking "geez, i forgot to smoke my smoke". 

my wife was asleep at the time but i told her about it in the morning. she just rolled her eyes and made some comment about me being a geek. i didn't bother to mention it to anyone after that.

now it's been bugging me for months, i cannot figure out what the object could have been. i'd really like to know if it was something man-made or not. i do not know of anything that makes right angle turns like that.

has anyone else seen this object or something similar? what the heck was it?
-- roger
content.summary: Star-like object moving in a zig zag pattern

content.detailedDescription:
My wife, janet, and i were driving in our saturn car after dark on friday, the day after thanksgiving, when my wife excitedly said "do you see that?" while pointing at an object in the night sky.  i looked and saw the strange object too.  

my wife, who saw the object longer and had a better vantage point, described the object as a green tear-drop with a whitish tail, sort of like a comet but not a comet as it was about the size of one or two houses and was descending rather slowly at maybe a 45-degree angle over some trees and a residential neighborhood that was behind some businesses.  during our viewing, the mysterious green object made no sound.

we watched for about 4-5 seconds as the object slowly came down and disappeared.  my wife is a bit of a skeptic and not into ufos like i am, but even she was extremely excited, perplexed, and agreed that it was a ufo.  it was not the right shape, color, and moving too "intelligently" and slow to be a natural object, helicopter, or plane.  it was moving too fast to be a balloon, and the latter do not have luminous tails, and it definitely was not a flare or swamp gas.  we both agreed that it was a ufo, probable et craft of some sort.  this realization left my wife not upset but a bit shaken.

we were about to turn left onto hull street (rt. 360), near the waffle house restaurant (speeks dr).  moments after the sighting, we saw a man working the drive-through window at a nearby hardee's restaurant (10210 hull st.) who was leaning/straining/looking out the window.  it was obvious that he saw the mysterious green ufo that we saw and was trying to see more.

my wife and i decided to check out the residential neighborhood behind the waffle house where we thought that the object may have come down, and as we drove down the streets, we saw some residents in the streets who were looking up, pointing, talking, and must have seen what we saw and also were curious.  it's possible that we may have midjudged the distance of the object, and it may have come down (landed?) a bit farther north, maybe not in the exact neighborhood where we were looking, but it was obvious that some other people probably saw the green ufo too!

after getting home, i went outside, even though the temperature was dropping into the 30s, and scanned the night sky for ufos, but all i could see were the stars and perhaps a planet.  i also called my friend, jeff, who is heavily into ufos, and told him about my sighting.

i feel very lucky to have seen this green comet-like tear-drop ufo.  i saw a cylindrical ufo with lights up close and personal in rural powhatan county, va many years before, so getting to see a second ufo in the city was not something that i was expecting and icing on my cake.  i personally believe that we are in what some call "the end time."
content.summary: Husband, wife, & others saw green tear-drop-shaped ufo with whitish tail descend slowly over trees & residential neighborhood the day after thanksgiving

content.detailedDescription: Looking at reflection of other room, walked right in front of me, did not open door, maybe 2 feet tall, wearing a black cloak with some device on face.  the reflection was from a mitsubishi rear projection tv screen, there was an interview of a football announcer on and the side was yellowed-out with the very side, left, blank.  it was very light in the room, and it was very clear and well defined.  it seemed to be headed to my computer, but when i got up and looked it was either gone or i couldn't see it.  i was doing my kids homework with him at the time.  i take no drugs, prescriptions, don't drink, wasn't sleepy.  i think it is a violation but have absolutely no recourse against something i can't identify.  i think it fits the description of one of the little greys, but cloaked.  again, it seemed like a small kid's gait and was wearing a black cloak with something on the face.  i felt nothing.  it passed my field of vision in about 2-3 feet, in other words, i saw it walk about 2-3 feet.  there was a window behind it-with the shades open.  it was very clearly defined. the photo below is from '03, but gives a good idea of how easy it was to see.  it was more normal than the sketch but i'm not gonna spend too much time on it.
content.summary: Child figure in my house

content.detailedDescription:
I am able to remember most of what happened a month and a half ago clearly without hypnotherapy(but because of the events that took place i can see how it could be useful: for bringing back memories). in the beginning of this event i was wearing a quartz necklace with a dragon given to me by my brother. it was explained to me that there is an eternal everlasting soul, and that god was becomming very angry with me and other people because of the lack of affection(the mood control was actually explained to me this day). that night a star or an object shot some thing blue down in to our yard two or three feet in front of our house. this blue light didn't move or disturb the ground at all when it hit. this event was followed by me getting on facebook.Com to send a friend a message, but then i started hearing chanting. the chanting started a time in my life i'll never forget, because either i had completely lost my mind, or there were some very strong forces at work. the force chanted some ones name over and over, and they changed that someones name totally around the next morning on facebook.Com. the forces claimed that they were very strong witches, and that they had the ability to control peoples moods. not only that, but they aren't just saying things in songs. my mom and i came to a self-diagnoses of either schizophrenia, or narcelepsy (a sleep problem in which you see two kinds of hallucinations hypnogogic and some other sort). i had been taking supplements dhea, pregnenolone, creatine, pantothenic acid, piracetam and royal jelly while the climax of these events took place. i wanted everything that was happening to stop, and i hoped it was happening, because the supplements i was taking, and that it would slowly fade with time. the television shows started getting weird, and by weird i mean i could remember them except the memories were new, and i could remember other memories, but it was as if they had been supressed, or that i had forgotten them, but all of a sudden they were there. two years before this all had started happening i was heavy in to marijuana, and i had experimented with ayahuasca and psilosybin mushrooms. but during this whole event i had not taken any drugs or alcohol. in fact i had not taken any thing for about 2 years. leading to this event i had performed meditation rituals in which i lined different stones according to my chakra centers. after i had lined all the stones up according the the centers i had a very realistic dream that some force was holding me down just along the left side of our house. the dream was so real that i screamed for someone to help me up. now i'll snap you back to the actual event with me. some morning after the chanting i woke up and saw snakes crawling around a figure like medusa, a blue mist of some kind shadowed in my eyes when the image(or hallucination) left me. the force claimed to be lucifer star of the morning, and explained to me that he or (s)he had been around an aeon!

aliens, demons, or angels? schizophrenia or conspiracy? mind control or paranoia? you be the judge....
content.summary: Amazing

content.detailedDescription: I cant stop looking at some of these video's from a youtuber.  he's catching something that looks like minature rods on film.  can you tell if its a fake?  i cant
content.summary: Small rods.

content.detailedDescription:
My son, nephew and i were on the back deck cleaning up the paper air planes we were flying down into the pasture.
the light from the north caught my eye and i observed the object coming through the cloud cover. the object was moving at jet speed - it was a fireball. at first i thought i was watching an aircraft burn up or very large meteor. but the craft continually slowed up yet maintained its spherical glow and straight line, the light - fire went out and then the craft turned to the west-south-west and disappeared from view behind the trees/hill. after the light went out the object was black and did not appear to be round but more angular.
after i first observed the object i alerted my son and nephew to it. they pulled out a camera and cell phone respectively and started recording the event.
i rushed and got my family out to see it too. 
please see the video links as follows:
http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=w5p-6qfz9xs
http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=bfjh0lmiar8
we have the original camera files ��� and can upload at a future date.
some interesting tidbits:
the fireball came from the north in a straight line in a parallel direction to the north western side of the house. there was thick cloud cover (details can be obtained through abe logs of the cloud ceiling).
there was no observed trail of falling debris nor was there any sound. if you missed the fireball in the 2 + minutes observed you most likely would have missed this event.

all together there were 8 other observers plus myself.

what does an atmospheric type of break without any sound, change direction and appear to head off at the same altitude (under the cloud ceiling)?
content.summary: Kutztown, pa usa - fireball that went out and black object changed direction

content.detailedDescription: Was at home on my acreage just outside of irricana ab (45 minute drive ne of calgary ab) on the phone to a friend & noticed a bright white dot in the sky sw of me.  asked the friend (who was located 30km s & 13 km e of me at the time) to look out the window & see if she saw it too. she could not see anything out of the ordinary in the south, north or west sky.  the sky was blue & streaked with long horizontal clouds.  the object looked just like you would imagine a distant comet coming towards the planet would look; white ball/dot, with the occasional flicker of what looked like a white (comet-ish) tail flaring out on either sided.  thought maybe it was a plane heading directly away from me, with the jet stream flaring out on either side, but then realized there was no sign of the jet stream left behind, so discounted that idea.  it didn't actually seem to be moving unless you sat & watched it for an extended time with markers in clouds/sky.  i watched it slowly move further south in the sky, still looking like a dot, leaving no trail behind (approx 5 minutes?). then it changed course (still super slow...) and appeared slightly different. it now didn't look like a ball, but just a trail starting through the clouds.. could not see anything leaving the trail.  the trail started out white, then changed to purpley grey heading sw in the sky, coming towards the ground at about a 45degree angle.  the object was still moving very slowly.  right about now realized i should get the camera & try to take some shots.  with the bright sky,the distance i needed to zoom in, and not the greatest camera, i wasn't able to see it in the camera's screen, but clicked away zooming in & out, hoping something would show up on the bigger computer screen.  got several shots that do not show the fireball/comet-ish object that initially caught my eye, but do show the tail it was leaving thru the clouds.  still kicking myself for not getting the camera sooner.  the object in right corner of pictures is our farm gas tank.  the object seemed to just fade into the cloud cover on the horizon.
content.summary: Something that looked like you would imagine a comet coming at you would look like, that then changed course and left a trail in the clouds. could not see a defined object

content.detailedDescription: Three of us, were out back facing south @ about 6pm. i looked up and saw a bright light heading in a se direction. i pointed it out to my uncle, and we noticed a second smaller one to the left and trailing the brighter one. shotly after noticing the second one, we realized a third. it too, was to the left, but further. position was in front of the second one. they all seem to be moving at a fast and constant speed. there were no red and green flashing light associated with them. altituted, i'm not sure. the bright one was pretty bright. brighter than any airplane i've seen around here. the other ones were dim. i went inside aftter they left our sight, to track were the space shuttle was, because i new it was landing soon. it was nowhere near iowa at the time in question. i'm not one to report things like this, but this was a real head scratcher!!!!!!!!!!!!
content.summary: One bright and two other lights heading se direction.

content.detailedDescription: Three of us, were out back facing south @ about 6pm. i looked up and saw a bright light heading in a se direction. i pointed it out to my uncle, and we noticed a second smaller one to the left and trailing the brighter one. shotly after noticing the second one, we realized a third. it too, was to the left, but further. position was in front of the second one. they all seem to be moving at a fast and constant speed. there were no red and green flashing light associated with them. altituted, i'm not sure. the bright one was pretty bright. brighter than any airplane i've seen around here. the other ones were dim. i went inside aftter they left our sight, to track were the space shuttle was, because i new it was landing soon. it was nowhere near iowa at the time in question. i'm not one to report things like this, but this was a real head scratcher!!!!!!!!!!!!

content.detailedDescription: On 11/17/2009 i was traveling home from work around 10:30 pm.  i was traveling west on a double lane road which had the typical late night traffic.  a car flashed his high beams at me and i automatically assumed, "ok a police officer is up ahead."  as i traveled down the road further, i saw a light up in the sky.  at this point, i was about a mile to two miles away from this light.  initially, i thought it was a helicopter because there was a light that kept flashing around (similar to a spot light on the front of a helicopter).  the road i was traveling on turned into a single lane road and was much more rural at this point.  i was only about half a mile away from whatever was in the sky, when i came to the conclusion there was no way it was a helicopter.  i came to a complete stop, rolled down my windows, turned off the radio, and observed.  at this point it became even more evident that my sighting was not a helicopter, small plane, weather balloon, or anything like that.  while i was stopped this object passed me going no more than 10 miles per hour about one hundred feet to my left over an open field and no more than two hundred feet above the ground.  it had one row of lights that illuminated from front to back one at a time.  in addition to it being dark out, the sky was filled with clouds, so i i could not use the moon's light as an aid to figure out the definite shape of the craft.  from what i gathered by the illumination of the light, it was a diamond shaped object.  i watched for another twenty seconds while it seemed to float across the air.  i started to drive off again when two more cars came behind me.  i looked in my rear-view mirror to see their reactions.  they as well, had come to a complete stop to observe.
content.summary: Spotted a diamond shaped ufo with a single row of lights.

content.detailedDescription: Looked out of window, and saw avery bright silver rotating object moving, north to northeast. it was really moving fast and was the size of a large rv. it was moving in straight line. watched it about 1 minute.
content.summary: Looked out window saw a fast moving oval,silver object moving.
